feed.title: mWASB - Faroe Island 2016
feed.subtitle: mini Workshop in applied structural bioinformatics

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
Welcome to the mini workshop in Applied Structural Bioinformatics at the Faroe Islands! This workshop will provide a practical introduction to popular tools for biomolecular visualisation, analysis and simulations.

Main topics

  • The protein data bank (PDB)
  • Protein structure visualization
  • Homology modelling
  • Protein structure analysis

Programs used during workshop

  • PyMOL
  • SwissModel, PsiPred
  • Bio3D-web
  • Bio3D
  • Muscle
  • DSSP
  • Blast / HMMER
entry.summary: Welcome to the mini workshop in Applied Structural Bioinformatics at the Faroe Islands! This workshop will provide a practical introduction to popular tools for biomolecular visualisation, analysis and simulations.
